name: Leap of Faith (Krmman)
description:
Leap of Faith!

Leap your way up to the top of the valley and take the leap of faith at the top!

Avoid crystals and watch out for the evil Forg, who will send you back to the beginning if you are too slow! Be sure to touch him to make him go away. Once you're at the top, jump as far as you can!

Controls

Space: Jump

Shift: Dive

A and D Keys: Move left and Right

Tips

You can press space when against an object to do a wall jump!

You can also get a little bit higher if you dive right after jumping.

Background Music Credit

Track: Waves 

Music composed and recorded by Oak Studios
